title: Breakingviews TV: Gun recoil
text:
Breakingviews TV: Gun recoil 5:45pm GMT - 04:16 
Consumers and companies are turning up the pressure on gun manufacturers in the wake of this month’s Florida shooting. Rob Cox talks with John Foley about where the backlash goes next, and how financial investors might scrutinize their own portfolios. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Consumers and companies are turning up the pressure on gun manufacturers in the wake of this month’s Florida shooting. Rob Cox talks with John Foley about where the backlash goes next, and how financial investors might scrutinize their own portfolios.
